previous: The airline was invited to be a part of the Star Alliance in 2007.[13] Air India completed the merger with Indian Airlines and some part of the agreed upgrades in its service and membership systems by 2011. In August 2011, Air India's invitation to join Star Alliance was suspended as a result of its failure to meet the minimum standards for the membership.[14] However, in October 2011, talks between the airline and Star Alliance resumed.[15] On 13 December 2013, Star Alliance announced that Air India and the alliance have resumed the integration process[16] and the airline became the 27th member of Star Alliance on 11 July 2014.[1]
